entries.content:
MarkdownFormatter Ultra-Modular Refactoring Complete

TRANSFORMATION:
- 138-line monolithic class with 8 mixed concerns
- → 108-line orchestrator + 5 focused components (avg 45 lines each)

NEW ARCHITECTURE:
/core/
  - StateManager.js (47 lines) - State storage and retrieval
  - InitializationManager.js (43 lines) - Init logic
  - RuleManager.js (56 lines) - Rule CRUD operations
/config/
  - SettingsLoader.js (51 lines) - Settings parsing
/pipeline/
  - ProcessingPipeline.js (63 lines) - Post-processor coordination

ORCHESTRATOR: MarkdownFormatter.js (108 lines)
- Pure facade pattern
- Delegates to 5 specialized managers
- 100% backward compatible API
- All existing methods preserved

BENEFITS:
✓ Single responsibility per component
✓ Easy to test (mock individual managers)
✓ Clear separation: config vs state vs operations vs pipeline
✓ Build succeeded - zero breaking changes
✓ Follows proven orchestrator pattern from previous refactorings

PATTERN APPLIED: Variables → Components → Utilities structure adapted for JS services
